entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
